snippet: Mr. Cramer, a Pulitzer Prize-winning journalist, was the author of “What It Takes,” an intimate, deeply reported account of the 1988 presidential election.
abstract: Richard Ben Cramer, Pulitzer Prize-winning journalist and author, dies at age 62.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Cramer, a Pulitzer Prize-winning journalist, was the author of “What It Takes,” an intimate, deeply reported account of the 1988 presidential election.

headline.main: Richard Ben Cramer, Writer of Big Ambitions, Dies at 62
